> Your friendly CLI task bot from Antarctica üêß

**Penguin** is a text-based chatbot that helps you manage tasks right from the terminal. It supports _todos_, **deadlines**, and **events**. It‚Äôs simple, **reliable**, and ~~GUI-heavy~~ delightfully minimal.
